description_top: Commentary on the Proverbs (bound with a printed Commentary on the Five Scrolls)
catalogue_description: Hebrew and Judaica Manuscripts at the Bodleian Libraries, Oxford University
title: Commentary on the Proverbs (bound with a printed Commentary on the Five Scrolls)
author: Levi ben Gershom
description: Contents: Joseph Kimḥi's commentary on the Proverbs (ff. 1-26). Levi ben Gershom's commentary on the Five Scrolls, ed. Riva di Trento (printed) (ff. 27-72).
